product_name: Black Diamond Magnetron VaporLock Locking Carabiner
long_description: Black Diamond's lightest pear-shaped locking 'biner, outfitted with innovative Magnetron Technology, the Magnetron VaporLock Locking Carabiner is the ultimate lightweight locker for long free climbs. Magnetron Technology uses a steel insert in the nose of the carabiner and 2 magnetic arms in the gate for a super-secure, super-fast and easy-to-use locking mechanism. Gate can be opened with 1 hand. Key lock nose won't snag on pro, ropes or slings, making the 'biner simple to clip. Pear shape increases friction up to 30% over a non-pear-shaped 'biner when lowering or rappelling with a Black Diamond ATC Belay Device (sold separately). Magnetron VaporLock Locking Carabiner from Black Diamond is munter hitch compatible on ropes up to 9.4 mm.
short_description: Black Diamond's lightest pear-shaped locking 'biner, outfitted with innovative Magnetron Technology, the Magnetron VaporLock Locking Carabiner is the ultimate lightweight locker for long free climbs.
